attributes.comment:
I am on H1B for past seven years. Due to the inefficiency of Government
departments my labor certification took more than 4 years and now my I140
application is pending over seven months. All these years my employer had to pay
hefty fees for my H1B renewal and also H4 renewal for my family. Now, USCIS is
proposing fee increase without providing any solution for the current immigration
mess. During this period, I can not change employer or get promotion. The US
immigration rules have made us "Human Slaves". I pay taxes at the same rate as
any other US citizen, but some benefits are denied to me because of my
immigration status. This is already causing mental and financial prolems. In
addition, this proposed fee increase will add extra burden to me without any real
benefit.

So I strongly oppose this fee increase.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Anonymous
